downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Demonstrate Permissions with SharePoint Server 2013
downloadDescription: This paper provides a brief introduction to SharePoint Server 2013 and illustrates how to configure permissions.
detailsSection: This paper contains a brief introduction to SharePoint Server 2013 and step-by-step instructions for configuring and demonstrating permissions behavior for intranet and team sites based on the Text Lab Guide: Configure Intranet and Team Sites with SharePoint Server 2013 (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=30379). This paper does not describe how to install and configure SharePoint Server 2013 in a pilot or production environment. For more information, see Install and deploy SharePoint 2013 (http://technet.microsoft.com/en-US/sharepoint/fp142376).
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Word 2010, Microsoft Word 2013, Adobe Portable Document File Reader
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper-right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
